      </a>

        <div class="text">

    </header>
    <div>
     <div class="hidden" data-drupal-messages-fallback="">
     </div>
     <div class="announcements" id="block-announcementblock">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="announcements__text">
        <p>
         Our gardens are open for you to relax and enjoy the fresh air but some of our buildings are closed in line with national guidance. Book a time slot to
         <a href="https://www.kew.org/kew-gardens/visit-kew-gardens/tickets">
          Kew Gardens
         </a>
         or
         <a href="https://www.kew.org/wakehurst/buy-tickets">
          Wakehurst
         </a>
         before you come. Please only visit if you live locally.
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="/kew-gardens/visit-kew-gardens/coronavirus-guidance">
          Read our guidance on coronavirus
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <main role="main">
     <a id="main-content" tabindex="-1">
     </a>
     <div class="layout-content">
      <section class="home-hero align-center size-default">
       <div class="home-hero__background home-hero__background-image" style="background-image:url(https://www.kew.org/sites/default/files/2020-05/12880_Kew_website_header_SPRING_desktop.jpg)">
       </div>
       <div class="home-hero__background--mobile home-hero__background-image" style="background-image:url(https://www.kew.org/sites/default/files/2020-05/12880_Kew_website_header_SPRING_mobile_0.jpg)">
       </div>
       <div class="container">
        <div class="home-hero__text">
         <h1 class="home-hero__title">
          Welcome to Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
         </h1>
         <h2 class="home-hero__description">
          Unlock the amazing power of plants and fungi. Visit our world-leading botanic gardens and discover our science and conservation work.
         </h2>
         <a class="home-hero__more-content-link" data-behavior="home-anchor" href="#more-content">
          <svg height="17px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 9" width="14px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
            <g fill="#070E1D" transform="translate(-678 -549)">
             <g transform="translate(-237 52)">
              <g transform="translate(907 493)">
               <path d="m7.9978 5.5443c0-0.26803 0.10297-0.53505 0.30791-0.73907 0.40988-0.40704 1.0757-0.40704 1.4866 0l5.2035 5.1725 5.2035-5.1725c0.41088-0.40704 1.0757-0.40704 1.4866 0 0.41088 0.40804 0.41088 1.0701 0 1.4771l-5.9463 5.9116c-0.41088 0.40804-1.0767 0.40804-1.4866 0l-5.9473-5.9116c-0.20494-0.20302-0.30791-0.47004-0.30791-0.73807z">
               </path>
              </g>
             </g>
            </g>
           </g>
          </svg>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
      <div id="more-content">
       <div>
        <div id="block-kew-gardens-mainpagecontent">
         <section class="section section--grey section--highlights section--no-description">
          <div class="section__header">
          </div>
          <div class="container section__main">
           <div class="section__children">
            <div class="highlights" data-behavior="highlights">
             <div class="highlights__content">
              <div class="highlights__image-wrapper" data-behavior="object-fit">
               <img alt="A couple walk towards the Palm House " height="2725" src="/sites/default/files/2019-08/Kew%20Winter%20-48%20%281%29.jpg" title="Visitors at Kew Gardens" typeof="foaf:Image" width="4088"/>
              </div>
              <div class="text-box highlights__text-box">
               <div class="text-box__wrapper text-box__wrapper--large">
                <p class="opening-times text-box__dates">
                 <span class="opening-times__title">
                 </span>
                 <span>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <h3 class="text-box__title">
                 Visit the world-famous Kew Gardens
                </h3>
                <p class="text-box__description">
                 Experience our beautiful botanic gardens and the most biodiverse place on Earth.
                </p>
                <span>
                 <a class="link" href="/kew-gardens" target="">
                  Explore Kew Gardens
                 </a>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="highlights__toggle">
              <input class="highlights__input" data-behavior="highlights-toggle" id="visit-the-world-famous-kew-gardens" tabindex="0" type="checkbox"/>
              <label class="highlights__label" for="visit-the-world-famous-kew-gardens" tabindex="-1">
               <span class="highlights__label-text">
               </span>
               <span class="highlights__label-icon">
                <svg height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 14" width="14px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                 <title>
                  Plus
                 </title>
                 <g fill="#FFFFFF" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
                  <path d="M8,6 L6,6 L0.914,6 C0.41,6 0,6.447 0,7 C0,7.553 0.41,8 0.914,8 L6,8 L8,8 L13.086,8 C13.591,8 14,7.553 14,7 C14,6.447 13.591,6 13.086,6 L8,6 Z">
                  </path>
                  <g class="highlights__vertical" transform="rotate(90, 7, 7)">
                   <path d="M8,6 L6,6 L0.914,6 C0.41,6 0,6.447 0,7 C0,7.553 0.41,8 0.914,8 L6,8 L8,8 L13.086,8 C13.591,8 14,7.553 14,7 C14,6.447 13.591,6 13.086,6 L8,6 Z">
                   </path>
                  </g>
                 </g>
                </svg>
               </span>
              </label>
              <div class="highlights__listings" data-behavior="highlights-listings">
               <div class="slider" data-behavior="slider" data-desktop="">
                <div class="slider__outer" data-behavior="outer">
                 <ul class="slider__wrapper views-item-list" data-behavior="scroller">
                 </ul>
                 <button class="slider-button slider-button--next" data-behavior="next">
                  <span class="screen-reader">
                   Next
                  </span>
                  <svg class="slider-button__icon" height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 8 14" width="8px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                   <title>
                    Arrow right
                   </title>
                   <g fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" transform="translate(-275.000000, -23.000000)">
                    <path d="M276.04425,37.00025 C275.77625,37.00025 275.50925,36.89725 275.30525,36.69225 C274.89825,36.28225 274.89825,35.61625 275.30525,35.20525 L280.47725,30.00025 L275.30525,24.79525 C274.89825,24.38425 274.89825,23.71925 275.30525,23.30825 C275.71325,22.89725 276.37525,22.89725 276.78225,23.30825 L282.69325,29.25625 C283.10125,29.66725 283.10125,30.33325 282.69325,30.74325 L276.78225,36.69225 C276.57925,36.89725 276.31225,37.00025 276.04425,37.00025">
                    </path>
                   </g>
                  </svg>
                 </button>
                 <button class="slider-button slider-button--prev slider-button--disabled" data-behavior="prev">
                  <span class="screen-reader">
                   Previous
                  </span>
                  <svg class="slider-button__icon" height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 8 14" width="8px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                   <title>
                    Arrow left
                   </title>
                   <g transform="rotate(180, 4, 7)">
                    <g fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" transform="translate(-275.000000, -23.000000)">
                     <path d="M276.04425,37.00025 C275.77625,37.00025 275.50925,36.89725 275.30525,36.69225 C274.89825,36.28225 274.89825,35.61625 275.30525,35.20525 L280.47725,30.00025 L275.30525,24.79525 C274.89825,24.38425 274.89825,23.71925 275.30525,23.30825 C275.71325,22.89725 276.37525,22.89725 276.78225,23.30825 L282.69325,29.25625 C283.10125,29.66725 283.10125,30.33325 282.69325,30.74325 L276.78225,36.69225 C276.57925,36.89725 276.31225,37.00025 276.04425,37.00025">
                     </path>
                    </g>
                   </g>
                  </svg>
                 </button>
                </div>
                <div class="slider-progress" data-behavior="progress">
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="section section--grey section--highlights section--no-description">
          <div class="section__header">
          </div>
          <div class="container section__main">
           <div class="section__children">
            <div class="highlights" data-behavior="highlights">
             <div class="highlights__content">
              <div class="highlights__image-wrapper" data-behavior="object-fit">
               <img alt="Colourful rhododendrons in spring at Wakehurst" height="892" src="/sites/default/files/2021-03/Wakehurst_Rhododendron_JH_cropped_2.jpg" title="Wakehurst rhododendrons in spring © RBG Kew/Jim Holden" typeof="foaf:Image" width="1396"/>
              </div>
              <div class="text-box highlights__text-box">
               <div class="text-box__wrapper text-box__wrapper--large">
                <p class="opening-times text-box__dates">
                 <span class="opening-times__title">
                 </span>
                 <span>
                 </span>
                </p>
                <h3 class="text-box__title">
                 Roam wild at Wakehurst
                </h3>
                <p class="text-box__description">
                 Visit our wild botanic garden, with 500 acres of woodland and the world's largest seed conservation project.
                </p>
                <span>
                 <a class="link" href="/wakehurst" target="_self">
                  Explore Wakehurst
                 </a>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="highlights__toggle">
              <input class="highlights__input" data-behavior="highlights-toggle" id="roam-wild-at-wakehurst" tabindex="0" type="checkbox"/>
              <label class="highlights__label" for="roam-wild-at-wakehurst" tabindex="-1">
               <span class="highlights__label-text">
               </span>
               <span class="highlights__label-icon">
                <svg height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 14" width="14px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                 <title>
                  Plus
                 </title>
                 <g fill="#FFFFFF" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
                  <path d="M8,6 L6,6 L0.914,6 C0.41,6 0,6.447 0,7 C0,7.553 0.41,8 0.914,8 L6,8 L8,8 L13.086,8 C13.591,8 14,7.553 14,7 C14,6.447 13.591,6 13.086,6 L8,6 Z">
                  </path>
                  <g class="highlights__vertical" transform="rotate(90, 7, 7)">
                   <path d="M8,6 L6,6 L0.914,6 C0.41,6 0,6.447 0,7 C0,7.553 0.41,8 0.914,8 L6,8 L8,8 L13.086,8 C13.591,8 14,7.553 14,7 C14,6.447 13.591,6 13.086,6 L8,6 Z">
                   </path>
                  </g>
                 </g>
                </svg>
               </span>
              </label>
              <div class="highlights__listings" data-behavior="highlights-listings">
               <div class="slider" data-behavior="slider" data-desktop="">
                <div class="slider__outer" data-behavior="outer">
                 <ul class="slider__wrapper views-item-list" data-behavior="scroller">
                 </ul>
                 <button class="slider-button slider-button--next" data-behavior="next">
                  <span class="screen-reader">
                   Next
                  </span>
                  <svg class="slider-button__icon" height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 8 14" width="8px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                   <title>
                    Arrow right
                   </title>
                   <g fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" transform="translate(-275.000000, -23.000000)">
                    <path d="M276.04425,37.00025 C275.77625,37.00025 275.50925,36.89725 275.30525,36.69225 C274.89825,36.28225 274.89825,35.61625 275.30525,35.20525 L280.47725,30.00025 L275.30525,24.79525 C274.89825,24.38425 274.89825,23.71925 275.30525,23.30825 C275.71325,22.89725 276.37525,22.89725 276.78225,23.30825 L282.69325,29.25625 C283.10125,29.66725 283.10125,30.33325 282.69325,30.74325 L276.78225,36.69225 C276.57925,36.89725 276.31225,37.00025 276.04425,37.00025">
                    </path>
                   </g>
                  </svg>
                 </button>
                 <button class="slider-button slider-button--prev slider-button--disabled" data-behavior="prev">
                  <span class="screen-reader">
                   Previous
                  </span>
                  <svg class="slider-button__icon" height="14px" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 8 14" width="8px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                   <title>
                    Arrow left
                   </title>
                   <g transform="rotate(180, 4, 7)">
                    <g fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" transform="translate(-275.000000, -23.000000)">
                     <path d="M276.04425,37.00025 C275.77625,37.00025 275.50925,36.89725 275.30525,36.69225 C274.89825,36.28225 274.89825,35.61625 275.30525,35.20525 L280.47725,30.00025 L275.30525,24.79525 C274.89825,24.38425 274.89825,23.71925 275.30525,23.30825 C275.71325,22.89725 276.37525,22.89725 276.78225,23.30825 L282.69325,29.25625 C283.10125,29.66725 283.10125,30.33325 282.69325,30.74325 L276.78225,36.69225 C276.57925,36.89725 276.31225,37.00025 276.04425,37.00025">
                     </path>
                    </g>
                   </g>
                  </svg>
                 </button>
                </div>
                <div class="slider-progress" data-behavior="progress">
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
